# ggseg.formats

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ggseg.formats is to provide S3 methods etc to the ggseg-universe. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of ggseg.formats from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ggseg/ggseg.formats")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(ggseg.formats)
## basic example code
```
